ui-settings-overlay-tooltip: Move Overlay by Draging Left bar.

ui-settings-iconflash: FFXIV Icon Blinks when Duty Matched/FATE occur
ui-settings-cheatroulette: Show Actual Matched Duty when using Duty Roulette
ui-settings-tweet-about:
When matched or FATE occurs, 
send a Tweet with mention to the entered Twitter account.
Enter the Twitter Account except the preceding symbol @.
ui-fate-about:
Select to receive notification, then press the Top Apply button.
Alert operates only when the character is in the FATE area.
